isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 - ADD-ON SLEEPER BOX - SLEEPER BOX OPENING BOOT - INSTALL

step1.para: Position opening boot between sleeper box and cab. Be sure the boot channels are properly positioned on the cab opening filler board.
Staple the outer edges of the opening boot to the cab opening filler board.
Position metal trim around edge of opening boot. Install self tapping screws to secure opening boot to cab opening filler.
Glue foam strip to opening boot. Foam that extends over the edges of the cab opening should be trimmed to be even with the cab openings.
Staple the outer edges of a second foam strip to the cab opening filler board. Trim excess foam.
The vinyl trim boot now must be positioned over the cab opening. Staple the edges of the trim boot to the cab opening filler board.
Install carpeting and trim between sleeper box and cab.
Staple trim strip to both sides of cab to sleeper box opening.
Install the cab rear trim panel.
Install the front trim sleeper box panel.
